name: Pomadoro timer
description: "Pomodoro" is Italian for tomato. The technique works by getting you to structure your work in 25-minute sessions, each separated by a short break. Each 25-minute session is one "pomodoro." When you complete one, take a five-minute break before embarking on the next.http://pomodorotechnique.com

browser_action.default_title: Pomadoro timer. Click to start/stop pomodoro session
